content.rendered:
Chaiiwala® has launched its first new store in Manchester Cheetham Hill.

Officially opening on the 4th of September following a soft-launch the branch has seen a significantly high level of support from the local community.

This shop has adopted some of our new key store features with greenery and added lighting to provide the best ambience for a relaxing, cool and photogenic atmosphere.

Visit our newly opened store and experience the King of Karak up north. We hope to see you soon.

Keep up to date with all things chaiiwala®

Keep up to date with all things chaiiwala® – subscribe to our newsletter and get blog updates! We regularly update it about what we’re up too, and tips and tricks on desi food to keep you in the know-how.
